types.html:
artiche m (plural artiches)

  1. (slang) money
    • 1970, San-Antonio, chapter 6, in Béru-Béru : roman d'aventures‎[1], Fleuve Noir, page 243:
      — Tu te rappelles la manière qu’il planque son artiche, au bagne, Papilloche?
      — Do you remember the way he hides his money, in prison, Papilloche?
  2. (slang) a purse

title: artiche
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /aʁ.tiʃ/
